entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HOT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
